sen.j: 昌義は父から継承した久慈郡佐竹郷を中心に勢力を拡張し、旧来から常陸国に土着していた小野崎氏(藤原秀郷流藤原氏)などを屈服させ、奥常陸7郡の支配をさらに進めた。
sen.e: Masayoshi expanded his power in Satake-go, Kuji County where he succeeded from his father, made the Onozaki clan (the Fujiwara clan of FUJIWARA no Hidesato house), who was traditionally settled in Hitachi Province, submit, and promoted his dominance in seven counties of Oku-Hitachi.
